mapper.select: /* NOT_SQL_LOG */ SELECT IR.IDX , U.NAME AS USER_NAME , IR.REPLY , IR.WRITE_AT FROM Inquiry_Reply AS IR LEFT JOIN Inquiry AS I ON I.IDX = IR.INQUIRY_IDX LEFT JOIN User AS U ON U.IDX = IR.USER_IDX LEFT JOIN Company AS C ON C.IDX = I.COMPANY_IDX WHERE I.IDX = #{inquiryIdx} AND C.IDX = #{companyIdx} ORDER BY IR.WRITE_AT ASC
